114423.「お父様 お母様 シラナミさん。\n ご歓談中のところ 失礼いたします。:
Father, Mother, Shiranami-san. Please excuse
me for interrupting your pleasant
conversation.

114424.「サツキさん。お戻りになったのですね。\n それは もしかすると 例の……？:
Matsuki-san. I see you are back. Is that
perhaps the one you mentioned?

114426.「まあ なんて 素敵なヴェール！\n <pc>さん ありがとうございます。\n:
Well, what a lovely Veil! <pc> Thank
you. I'm sorry. I'm sorry to have bothered
you.

114427.「まったくだ。私の言うとおり\n シラナミ君の 厚意に甘えていれば\n 迷惑をか:
I am sorry to hear that. If I had just taken
advantage of Shiranami's kindness, as I said,
I wouldn't have had to go through the trouble.

114428.「まあまあ。よいではないですか。\n たしかに わが家の専属デザイナーのウデ前を:
Well, well, well. It's good, isn't it? It's
true that I regret that I couldn't show off
the skills of our resident Zeiner.

114429.「聞くところによれば その幸せのヴェールは\n 花嫁を幸せへ導くという いわれの:
The Veil of Happiness is said to be a very
precious object that is supposed to bring
happiness to the bride.

114430.「高貴なる勝ち組の僕と言えども これほどの物を\n 用意することは 難しかったで:
Even I, the noble winner, would have found it
difficult to prepare something like this.
Thank you both very much.

114431.「いいえ。私は 妹の門出を\n 最高の形で 祝福したかっただけですから。\n 気:
No. I just wanted to congratulate my sister in the best possible way. I just wanted to congratulate my sister in the best possible
way. I'm glad you liked it.

114432.「幸せへ導くヴェール……か。\n 今度こそ本当に 幸せになってくれれば\n よい:
The Veil that leads to happiness. I hope he
will be really happy this time.

114433.「ご心配には およびませんよ。\n 僕は 借金を作ったあげく逃げ出すような\n:
Don't worry. I am not one of those losers who
run away after creating debts!

114435.「そう言ってくれると アタシとしても\n 安心だよぉぉ……ひぃ…ひぃ……ふぅ。: I'm relieved to hear you say that.

114438.「な…なによぉぉ。実の姉に対して\n まるでミイラでも 見たかのような\n その:
What is it? That reaction to your own sister,
as if she were a mummy.

114439.「かわいい妹の 結婚式のため\n マッハで駆けつけたのにぃぃ。\n ……へぇ…へ:
I rushed to the wedding of my cute sister in
Mach. Hee hee hee ho.

114440.「出席連絡もよこさずに 突然現れるからだ。\n てっきり 来ないものだと思ってい:
I thought you would not show up at all. I
thought you would never show up.

114441.「これはこれは……！ 遠くから わざわざ\n ありがとうございます。皆さんから\:
Well, well, well! Thank you for coming all the
way from afar. I have heard of your fame for
many years.

114442.「いやぁぁ……それほどでもぉぉ……。\n うふふ……確かに 新しいダンナさん\n:
Oh, not so much. The new husband certainly
looks better and more solid than the old one.

114443.「ヤヨイさんほどの 鑑定眼の持ち主に\n おスミ付きをいただけるとは！ ますます:
I was surprised to receive an endorsement from someone who has such a good eye for appraisal as Yayoi-san! I am sure that the level of
winners will go up even more.

114444.「でも 意外だったよねぇ……。\n 前のダンナさん 頼りなかったけど\n 逃げ出:
But it was unexpected, wasn't it? The previous
husband was unreliable, but he didn't seem to
run away.

114445.「しかし 現に今の今まで 戻ってきていない。\n 逃げ出したとしか 考えられませ:
But, to tell the truth, he hasn't come back
until this very moment. We can only assume
that he ran away.

114448.「さあ……あんな 負け犬のことは忘れて\n すべては この勝ち組・オブ・勝ち組…:
Now forget about those losers and leave
everything to Shiranami, the great successor
of winners.

114449.「ミナヅキさんは 僕が責任を持って\n 幸せに してみせますから。\n そう……:
I will make you happy with my responsibility.
I swear on that Veil of Happiness.

115774.「<pc>さんに\n お手伝いいただいた おかげで\n なんとか 間に合わせられ:
Thanks to the help of <pc>, we
managed to make it in time.

120004.<pc>は サツキに連れられて\nジュレットの町へ 戻っていった。:
<pc> returned to Julet Town with
Satsuki.
